Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Lanreotide acetate is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Gastroenteropancreatic neuroendocrine tumors. It is used in some adults whose tumors cannot be removed by surgery, are locally advanced, or have metastasized (spread to other parts of the body).

Section.Para: Lanreotide acetate is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions or types of cancer.
